attributes.action: Vote Of No Confidence In Ian Duncan Smith
attributes.background: Ian Duncan Smith has caused devastation for the poorest in society for the last 5 years. The country cannot afford another 5 years of this person running the DWP, with the recent welfare reform that will cause nothing but immense poverty in the UK.

rejection.details:
We already have three petitions calling for a vote of no confidence in Mr.Duncan Smith:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104436

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106803

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106396
